designer.title: Curriculum Vitae - Designer
designer.description: As a designer, I specialize in creating intuitive interfaces and engaging user experiences.

experience.description: Designed responsive interfaces, conducted user research, and improved user flows.
Created branding materials, visual identities, and marketing collateral for clients.

developer.title: Curriculum Vitae - Developer
developer.description: As a developer, I specialize in front-end technologies and creating interactive web applications.

experience.description: Implemented complex UI components, improved application performance, and integrated RESTful APIs.
Developed custom web solutions, integrated 3D interactive graphics, and maintained scalable codebases.
